name: Doorbot Server
description: Server to manage member access for doorbots

scripts.postdeploy: bundle exec rake db:migrate; bundle exec rake db:seed

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: The administrator's email address for signing in.

ADMIN_PASSWORD.description: The administrator's password for signing in.

DEVISE_EMAIL_SENDER.description: The email to use for the send field in automatic emails.

DEVISE_SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key used by Devise. Devise uses this key to generate random tokens.

MANDRILL_USERNAME.description: The username for your mandrill addon.

MANDRILL_PASSWORD.description: The password for your mandrill addon.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key is used for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.
